welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Mateo, the charming city known for its rich culture and stunning landscapes. Get ready to be captivated by its beauty and immerse yourself in its vibrant atmosphere. We invite you to explore and indulge in all that our city has to offer!"

restaurants.name: Xelapan
restaurants.description: Xelapan is a bakery located in La Esperanza.

restaurants.name: Tentazioni
restaurants.description: Tentazioni is a italian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Santa Escolástica Café
restaurants.description: Santa Escolástica Café is a café located in the city.

restaurants.description: El Portal De La Quinta is a american restaurant located in Quetzaltenango.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.
